reports.title: Study Overview
reports.query:
**Study Specification Progress**

Select study and browse status reports.

reports.title: Select Study Number
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`StudyValue`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`study_number`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`study_number` as value LIMIT 5

reports.title: About this study
reports.query:
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: $neodash_studyvalue_study_number})-[r2]->(sp:StudyProjectField)<-[r3]-(p:Project)<-[r4]-(cp:ClinicalProgramme)
RETURN cp.name as Programme, p.name as Project, sv.study_id_prefix + '-' + sv.study_number as StudyID, sv.study_acronym as Acronym

reports.title: Progress overview
reports.query:
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: '0'})-[r2]->(so:StudyObjective)-->(ov:ObjectiveValue)
RETURN 'StudyObjective' as category, count(*) as value
UNION
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: '0'})-[r2]->(se:StudyEndpoint)-->(ev:EndpointValue)
RETURN 'StudyEndpoint' as category, count(*) as value
UNION
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: '0'})-[r2]->(sc:StudyCriteria)-->(cv:CriteriaValue)
RETURN 'StudyCriteria' as category, count(*) as value

reports.title: Study Definition
reports.query:
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: $neodash_studyvalue_study_number})-[r2]->(sp:StudyProjectField)<-[r3]-(p:Project)<-[r4]-(cp_ClinicalProgramme)
OPTIONAL MATCH (sv)-[r5]->(i:StudyArrayField {field_name: 'DiseaseConditionOrIndicationCodes'})
RETURN *

reports.title: Status overview
reports.query: (A study status overview will go here)

reports.title: Study Type parameters for study design
reports.query:
// Get number of study type study design parameters defined
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: $neodash_studyvalue_study_number})-[r2]->(sa:StudyField)
WHERE sa.field_name in ['StudyTypeCode','TrialTypeCodes','TrialPhaseCode','IsExtensionTrial','IsAdaptiveDesign','StudyStopRules','ConfirmedResponseMinimumDuration','PostAuthIndicator']
RETURN 'Number of study type parameters defined' as Check, 'OK' as Level, count(*) as Value
UNION
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: $neodash_studyvalue_study_number})-[r2]->(sa:StudyField)
WHERE sa.field_name in ['StudyTypeCode','TrialTypeCodes','TrialPhaseCode','IsExtensionTrial','IsAdaptiveDesign','StudyStopRules','ConfirmedResponseMinimumDuration','PostAuthIndicator']
RETURN 'Missing study type parameters' as Check, 'Warning' as Level, 8 - count(*) as Value;

reports.title: Study Type parameter Status
reports.query:
// Get number of study type study design parameters defined
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: $neodash_studyvalue_study_number})-[r2]->(sa:StudyField)
WHERE sa.field_name in ['StudyTypeCode','TrialTypeCodes','TrialPhaseCode','IsExtensionTrial','IsAdaptiveDesign','StudyStopRules','ConfirmedResponseMinimumDuration','PostAuthIndicator']
RETURN 'Number of study type parameters defined' as Check, 'OK' as Level, count(*) as Value
UNION
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: $neodash_studyvalue_study_number})-[r2]->(sa:StudyField)
WHERE sa.field_name in ['StudyTypeCode','TrialTypeCodes','TrialPhaseCode','IsExtensionTrial','IsAdaptiveDesign','StudyStopRules','ConfirmedResponseMinimumDuration','PostAuthIndicator']

WITH 'Missing study type parameters' as Check, 'Warning' as Level, 8 - count(*) as Value
WHERE Value <> 0
RETURN *

reports.title: Study Arm Issues
Study Arm Status
reports.query:
// Get number of study arms and number of arms with issues
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: $neodash_studyvalue_study_number})-[r2]->(sa:StudyArm)
WHERE sa.number_of_subjects IS NOT NULL and sa.number_of_subjects > 0
RETURN 'Number of study arms' as Check, 'OK' as Level, count(*) as Value
UNION
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: $neodash_studyvalue_study_number})-[r2]->(sa:StudyArm)
WHERE sa.number_of_subjects IS NULL or sa.number_of_subjects < 1
RETURN 'Study arm missing value for planned number of subjects' as Check, 'Warning' as Level, count(*) as Value
UNION
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: $neodash_studyvalue_study_number})
WHERE NOT EXISTS {
  (sv)-[r2]->(sa:StudyArm)
}
RETURN 'No Study Arm have been defined' as Check, 'Error' as Level, count(*) as Value;

reports.title: Study Epoch Issues
Study Visits Issues
reports.query:
// Get number of study epochs and number of arms with issues
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: $neodash_studyvalue_study_number})-[r2]->(v:StudyVisit)
RETURN 'Number of study visits' as Check, 'OK' as Level, count(*) as Value
UNION
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: $neodash_studyvalue_study_number})-[r2]->(v:StudyVisit)
WHERE v.start_rule is null or v.start_rule = ''
RETURN 'Study visit start rule is not defined' as Check, 'Warning' as Level, count(*) as Value

MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: $neodash_studyvalue_study_number})-[r2]->(v:StudyVisit)
WHERE v.start_rule is not null or v.start_rule <> ''
RETURN 'Number of study visits' as Check, 'OK' as Level, count(*) as Value
UNION
MATCH (sr:StudyRoot)-[r1:LATEST]->(sv:StudyValue {study_number: $neodash_studyvalue_study_number})-[r2]->(v:StudyVisit)
WHERE v.start_rule is null or v.start_rule = ''
RETURN 'Study visit start rule is not defined' as Check, 'Warning' as Level, count(*) as Value

reports.title: Select Assessment Instance
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`AssessmentInstance`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Assessment Instance
reports.query:
MATCH (n1:ActivityGroup)-->(n2:ActivitySubGroup)-->(n3:Assessment)-->(n4:AssessmentInstance {name: $neodash_assessmentinstance_name})-->(n5:AssessmentVariable)-->(n6:SDTMDomain)
RETURN n1.name as ActivityGroup,
       n2.name as ActivitySubGroup,
       n3.name as Activity,
       n4.name as AssessmentInstance,
       n6.code_submission_value as SDTMDomain;

reports.title: Concept Graph
reports.query:
MATCH path=(g)-[*1..3]->(ai:AssessmentInstance {name: $neodash_assessmentinstance_name})-[r2]->(av:AssessmentVariable)-->(n)
RETURN path;

reports.title: SDTM Column Level Metadata
reports.query:
MATCH (g)-[*1..3]->(ai:AssessmentInstance {name: $neodash_assessmentinstance_name})-[r2]->(av:AssessmentVariable)-->(sdtmvar:SDTMVariable)
OPTIONAL MATCH (ai)-->()-->(sd:SDTMDomain)
RETURN DISTINCT sd.code_submission_value as Domain, sdtmvar.name as Variable, sdtmvar.label as Label, sdtmvar.core as Core, sdtmvar.role as Role, sdtmvar.xmlcodelist

reports.title: SDTM Value Level Metadata
reports.query:
MATCH (g)-[*1..3]->(ai:AssessmentInstance {name: $neodash_assessmentinstance_name})-[r2]->(av:AssessmentVariable),(sdtmvar:SDTMVariable)<--(av)-->(ct:CTTerm)
OPTIONAL MATCH (ai)-->()-->(sd:SDTMDomain)
RETURN DISTINCT sd.code_submission_value as Domain, sdtmvar.name as Variable, sdtmvar.label as Label, sdtmvar.xmlcodelist, ct.code_submission_value as Value

reports.title: Concept Metadata
reports.query:
MATCH (n1:ActivityGroup)-[]->(n2:ActivitySubGroup)-[]->(n3:Assessment)-[]->(n4:AssessmentInstance {name: $neodash_assessmentinstance_name})-[r4:COLLECTED_IN]->(n5:AssessmentVariable)-[r6:TABULATED_IN]->(n7:SDTMVariable)
OPTIONAL MATCH (n5)-[]->(n6:ItemDef)
OPTIONAL MATCH (n5)-[r7:VALID_VALUE]->(n8:CTTerm)
RETURN DISTINCT n1.name AS ActivityGroup, n2.name AS ActivitySubGroup, n4.name AS AssessmentInstance, n4.topic_code AS TopicCode, n4.adam_param_code AS AdamParamCode, n5.order AS Order, n6.uid AS ODMItemDefOid, n6.label AS ODMItemDefLabel, n6.datatype AS ODMItemDefType, n7.name AS SDTMVariable, n7.label AS SDTMLabel, n7.role AS SDTMRole, n7.core AS SDTMCore, n7.xmlcodelist AS Codelist, n8.code_submission_value AS SubmissionValue, n8.nci_preferred_name AS PreferredName, n8.uid AS ConceptID
ORDER BY n4.name, n5.order;

reports.title: Concept Graph
reports.query:
MATCH path1=(n1:ActivityGroup)-[]->(n2:ActivitySubGroup)-[]->(n3:Assessment)-[]->(n4:AssessmentInstance)-[r4:COLLECTED_IN]->(n5:AssessmentVariable)
MATCH path2=(n5)-[r6:TABULATED_IN]->(n7:SDTMVariable)
WHERE n4.name = $neodash_assessmentinstance_name
OPTIONAL MATCH path3=(n5)-[]->(n6:ItemDef)
OPTIONAL MATCH path4=(n5)-[r7:VALID_VALUE]->(n8:CTTerm)
RETURN *;

reports.title: Select Activity Concept
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`ActivityInstance`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 8

reports.title: Activity Grouping
reports.query:
MATCH (n1:ActivityGroup)-->(n2:ActivitySubGroup)-->(n3:Activity)-->(n4:ActivityInstance {name: $neodash_activityinstance_name})
RETURN n1.name as ActivityGroup,
       n2.name as ActivitySubGroup,
       n3.name as Activity,
       n4.name as ActivityInstance;

reports.title: Activity Concept Graph Model
reports.query:
MATCH (agrp:ActivityGroup)-[r1]->(asgrp:ActivitySubGroup)-[r2]->(act:Activity)-[r3]->(ai:ActivityInstance {name: $neodash_activityinstance_name})-[r4]->(aitm:ActivityItem)-[r5]->(aitmc:ActivityItemClass),
(ai)-[r6]->(aic:ActivityInstanceClass)
OPTIONAL MATCH (dt:CTTerm)<-[r7:HAS_TYPE]-(aitmc)-[r8:HAS_ROLE]->(rl:CTTerm)
OPTIONAL MATCH (aitm)-[r9]->(ct:CTTerm)
RETURN *

reports.title: List Generic Activity Concept Definition
reports.query:
MATCH (agrp:ActivityGroup)-[r1]->(asgrp:ActivitySubGroup)-[r2]->(act:Activity)-[r3]->(ai:ActivityInstance {name: $neodash_activityinstance_name})-[r4]->(aitm:ActivityItem)-[r5]->(aitmc:ActivityItemClass),
(ai)-[r6]->(aic:ActivityInstanceClass)
OPTIONAL MATCH (dt:CTTerm)<-[:HAS_TYPE]-(aitmc)-[:HAS_ROLE]->(rl:CTTerm)
OPTIONAL MATCH (aitm)-[r7]->(ct:CTTerm)
RETURN  distinct
       //agrp.name as ActivityGroup,
       //asgrp.name as ActivitySubGroup,
       //act.name as Activity,
       ai.name as ActivityInstance,
       aitmc.name as ActivityItemClass,
       aitmc.mandatory,
       aitmc.order,
       dt.code_submission_value as DataType,
       rl.code_submission_value as Role,
       aitmc.data_collection;

reports.title: Activity Concept Graph Model linked to SDTMIG
reports.query:
MATCH (agrp)-[r1]->(asgrp)-[r2]->(act)-[r3]->(ai:ActivityInstance {name: $neodash_activityinstance_name})-[r4]->(aitm1:ActivityItem),
(aitm1)-[r5]->(aitmc1:ActivityItemClass),
(ai)-[r6]->(aic:ActivityInstanceClass)-[r7:PARENT_CLASS]->(aicp:ActivityInstanceClass)-[r8]->(dc:DatasetClass)
OPTIONAL MATCH (dc)-[r9]->(ds:Dataset),
(ai)-[r10]->(aitm2:ActivityItem)-[r11]->(aitmc2:ActivityItemClass)-[r12]->(vc2:VariableClass)-[r15]->(v2:Variable)<-[r16]-(ds),
(aitm1)-[r17]->(ct1:CTTerm)-[r18]->(ds:Dataset)
OPTIONAL MATCH (ds)<-[r19]-(dmig:DataModelIG)
OPTIONAL MATCH (aitm2)-[r20]->(ct2:CTTerm)
RETURN *;

reports.title: List Activity Concept linked to SDTMIG
reports.query:
MATCH (agrp)-[r1]->(asgrp)-[r2]->(act)-[r3]->(ai:ActivityInstance {name: $neodash_activityinstance_name})-[r4]->(aitm1:ActivityItem),
(aitm1)-[r5]->(aitmc1:ActivityItemClass),
(ai)-[r6]->(aic:ActivityInstanceClass)-[r7:PARENT_CLASS]->(aicp:ActivityInstanceClass)-[r8]->(dc:DatasetClass)
OPTIONAL MATCH (dc)-[r9]->(ds:Dataset),
(ai)-[r10]->(aitm2:ActivityItem)-[r11]->(aitmc2:ActivityItemClass)-[r12]->(vc2:VariableClass)-[r15]->(v2:Variable)<-[r16]-(ds),
(aitm1)-[r17]->(ct1:CTTerm)-[r18]->(ds:Dataset)
OPTIONAL MATCH (ds)<-[r19]-(dmig:DataModelIG)
OPTIONAL MATCH (aitm2)-[r20]->(ct2:CTTerm)
RETURN distinct dmig.uid as DataModelIG,
       ds.code as Dataset,
       ai.name as ActivityInstance,
       aitmc2.name as ActivityItemClass,
       vc2.name as VariableClass,
       vc2.label as VariableClassLabel,
       v2.uid as Variable,
       v2.label as VariableLabel;
